name: LRP's Special Education School Attorneys Conference
content: LRP’s Special Education School Attorneys Conference is the best place to earn a year’s worth of CLEs, gain new insights from leading attorneys and gather valuable guidance you can use to help your school district clients avoid costly legal missteps when serving students with disabilities. This pivotal event helps you stay on top of current legal issues by bringing together expert attorneys to offer their experienced perspective on navigating the ever-changing special education legal landscape. With a focus on IDEA, Section 504 and more hot topics, you’ll gain the tools needed to counsel your clients on the compliant ways to address specific concerns. During three jam-packed days, you'll dig deeply into the current issues effecting school districts today and get ready for litigation trends to come ... all while you earn an entire year’s worth of CLE credits!
